synopsis.text:
Tarama, a loyal nanny, whisks away one of the newborn twins, Jimsa and Affle, from the clutches of a mechanized alien invasion that has befallen the Andromeda galaxy's thriving human civilization on the planet Astria. The twins, born to the loving union of Prince Ithaca of Cosmoralia and Princess Lilia of Ayodoya, possess extraordinary powers that could be humanity's last hope against the mysterious machine force.

As the royal capital crumbles under the relentless assault, the separated twins embark on a perilous journey to reunite and unlock their true potential. Along the way, they encounter a diverse group of allies, including Il, a formidable cyborg warrior, Arc and Beth, a pair of resourceful robots, and the cryptic mastermind known as The Elder.

With the fate of Astria and possibly the entire human race hanging in the balance, Jimsa and Affle must harness their innate abilities and forge alliances to confront the enigmatic enemy that threatens to eradicate all human life on the planet. Witness the epic saga of love, courage, and resilience as these young heroes rise to challenge their destiny and restore peace to their war-torn world.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
